p: Free-ranging Serengeti hyenas ( Crocuta crocuta) and captive hyenas may succumb following CDV infection ( Fig.Â 6). Sequence data revealed closest homology to CDV strains causing high mortality in sympatric lions [117]. Seropositivity of living animals indicates that Serengeti hyenas may also become subclinically infected without overt disease or can recover from disease, respectively [118]. Similarly, CDV exposure has been reported from Zambian hyenas [41].
